medium: Etching and drypoint with plate tone
portfolio: From The First Venice Set or Twelve Etchings 1880
provenance: John S. Bradstreet, Minneapolis (bought at Whistler's exhibition Arrangement in White and Yellow at the Fine Art Society in London in 1883, 1883-1914; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LL recto, in pencil: sheet trimmed leaving a tab for Whistler's butterfly monogram and [imp.]
title: The Old Doorway from The First Venice Set
